Vigor.name: Vigor
descriptions: Increases maximum Energy by 10 and increases Energy regeneration by 5 per tick.

Gaining an Advantage.name: Gaining an Advantage
descriptions: Your auto attacks have a 20% chance to reduce the target's Stats by $33708s1% and increase your Agility by $33709s1%. Lasts $33708d, stacks up to $33708u times.
Your auto attacks have a 40% chance to reduce the target's Stats by $33708s1% and increase your Agility by $33709s1%. Lasts $33708d, stacks up to $33708u times.
Your auto attacks have a 60% chance to reduce the target's Stats by $33708s1% and increase your Agility by $33709s1%. Lasts $33708d, stacks up to $33708u times.
Your auto attacks have a 80% chance to reduce the target's Stats by $33708s1% and increase your Agility by $33709s1%. Lasts $33708d, stacks up to $33708u times.
Your auto attacks have a 100% chance to reduce the target's Stats by $33708s1% and increase your Agility by $33709s1%. Lasts $33708d, stacks up to $33708u times.

Cold Blooded.name: Cold Blooded
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ambush, Hemorrhage and Eviscerate abilities by 3%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ambush, Hemorrhage and Eviscerate abilities by 5%.

Seal Fate.name: Seal Fate
descriptions: Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points  have a 20% chance to add an additional combo point.
Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points  have a 40% chance to add an additional combo point.
Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points  have a 60% chance to add an additional combo point.
Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points  have a 80% chance to add an additional combo point.
Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points  have a 100% chance to add an additional combo point.

Total Control.name: Total Control
descriptions: Increases the duration of your control effects by $S1%.
Increases the duration of your control effects by $S1%.

Improved Kidney Shot.name: Improved Kidney Shot
descriptions: While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional 5% damage from all sources. In addition, decreases the cooldown of your Kidney Shot ability by 5 sec.
While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional 10% damage from all sources. In addition, decreases the cooldown of your Kidney Shot ability by 10 sec.
While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional 15% damage from all sources. In addition, decreases the cooldown of your Kidney Shot ability by 15 sec.

Death Mark.name: Death Mark
descriptions:
Your Ambush, Garrote and Cheap Shot marks the target. Marked enemy can always be seen by the rogue whether it stealths or turns invisible, the target also appears on the mini-map and cannot flee or move faster than his normal movement speed.
This effect lasts $33696d and can only occur once every 60 sec.

Your Ambush, Garrote and Cheap Shot marks the target. Marked enemy can always be seen by the rogue whether it stealths or turns invisible, the target also appears on the mini-map and cannot flee or move faster than his normal movement speed.
This effect lasts $33697d and can only occur once every 60 sec.

Vile Poisons.name: Vile Poisons
descriptions: Increases the effectiveness of your poisons by 5% and gives your poisons an additional 10% chance to resist dispel effects.
Increases the effectiveness of your poisons by 10% and gives your poisons an additional 20% chance to resist dispel effects.
Increases the effectiveness of your poisons by 15% and gives your poisons an additional 30% chance to resist dispel effects.
Increases the effectiveness of your poisons by 20% and gives your poisons an additional 40% chance to resist dispel effects.
Increases the effectiveness of your poisons by 25% and gives your poisons an additional 50% chance to resist dispel effects.

Improved Poisons.name: Improved Poisons
descriptions: Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 2%.
Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 4%.
Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 6%.
Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 8%.
Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 10%.

Lethality.name: Lethality
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ambush and Hemorrhage abilities by 10%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ambush and Hemorrhage abilities by 20%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ambush and Hemorrhage abilities by 30%.

Malice.name: Malice
descriptions: Increases your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases your critical strike chance by 2%.
Increases your critical strike chance by 3%.
Increases your critical strike chance by 4%.
Increases your critical strike chance by 5%.

Remorseless Attacks.name: Remorseless Attacks
descriptions: After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, gives you a $14143s1% increased critical strike chance on your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, or Hemorrhage.  Lasts $14143d.
After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, gives you a $14149s1% increased critical strike chance on your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, or Hemorrhage.  Lasts $14149d.

Improved Eviscerate.name: Improved Eviscerate
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by 10%.
Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by 15%.

Relentless Strikes.name: Relentless Strikes
descriptions: Your finishing moves have a $b1% chance per combo point to restore $14181s1 energy.

Exhaustion.name: Exhaustion
descriptions: Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice, Rupture and Expose Armor abilities by 25%.
Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice, Rupture and Expose Armor abilities by 50%.

Seek and Destroy.name: Seek and Destroy
descriptions:
Your Detection ability now shows the location of all nearby humanoids on the minimap.
Also increases movement and mounted movement speed by 5%.  This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

Your Detection ability now shows the location of all nearby humanoids on the minimap.
Also increases movement and mounted movement speed by 10%.  This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

Ruthlessness.name: Ruthlessness
descriptions: Gives your finishing moves a 301% chance to add a combo point to your target.
Gives your finishing moves a 601% chance to add a combo point to your target.
Gives your finishing moves a 901% chance to add a combo point to your target.

Cold Blood.name: Cold Blood
descriptions: When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, or Eviscerate by 100%.

Vitality.name: Vitality
descriptions: Allows 5% of your Health regeneration to work while in combat. In addition, healing taken increased by 15%.
Allows 10% of your Health regeneration to work while in combat. In addition, healing taken increased by 30%.

Bloodthirsty.name: Bloodthirsty
descriptions: Increases the damage dealt by your Garrote and Rupture abilities by 10%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Garrote and Rupture abilities by 20%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Garrote and Rupture abilities by 30%.
